directions: Spread hummus onto sandwich wrap. Arrange artichoke hearts and red bell pepper pieces atop the hummus. Scatter mozzarella cheese over artichokes and bell pepper; top with spinach. Roll the sandwich wrap around the ingredients to serve.
ingredients: 3 marinated artichoke hearts, cut into small pieces
1 roasted red bell pepper, cut into small pieces
title: Hummus and Artichoke Wrap
